title: SpanEvent
description: Timestamped annotation within a span's lifetime, used to record significant moments such as exceptions (OTel semantic convention: name='exception' with exception.type, exception.message, and exception.stacktrace attributes) or state transitions.

attributes.description: Key-value pairs of observability metadata attached to this signal, per the OpenTelemetry attribute specification. Keys are strings; values may be strings, booleans, integers, floats, or arrays thereof.
